txt.en: Hauntreek can be found in the ruins of Nuiharn, west of Haerondir.\n\nCollect Hauntreek.
Rhadrog can be found in Haerondir.\n\nYou should take the additional Hauntreek and deliver it to Rhadrog.
'Thank you, my friend. Our company shall put the rest of this Hauntreek you bring us to good use when any additional braziers begin to burn low.'
Put the Hauntreek you collected in the braziers found around Haerondir that are beginning to burn low.\n\nThe Hauntreek will cause the fire to burn a strange blue colour.
Even in the harsh terrain of the Noman-lands, life, though it hardy and few, still flourishes.

'Hail, [placeholder]!

'If you are willing, I once again have need of your aid. I would ask that you travel through the Noman-lands and gather any Hauntreek you may find. My fellow Rangers and I have great need of them at Haerondir, especially with our foes so close by.

'Deliver the Hauntreek to the Rangers at Haerondir, where it will surely be put to good use.'
Deliver the Hauntreek to Rhadrog in Haerondir
